title: Amortized Inference of Multi-Modal Posteriors using Likelihood-Weighted Normalizing Flows
summary: We present a novel technique for amortized posterior estimation using Normalizing Flows trained with likelihood-weighted importance sampling. This approach allows for the efficient inference of theoretical parameters in high-dimensional inverse problems without the need for posterior training samples.
